entries.en-US: # Everything Claude Code
entries.zh-Hans: # Everything Claude Code

entries.en-US: **The complete collection of Claude Code configs from an Anthropic hackathon winner.**
entries.zh-Hans: **Anthropic 黑客马拉松获胜者提供的完整 Claude Code 配置集合。**

entries.en-US: Production-ready agents, skills, hooks, commands, rules, and MCP configurations evolved over 10+ months of intensive daily use building real products.
entries.zh-Hans: 经过 10 多个月的密集日常使用，在构建真实产品的过程中演化出的生产就绪的智能体、技能、钩子、命令、规则和 MCP 配置。

entries.en-US: ## The Guides
entries.zh-Hans: ## 指南

entries.en-US: This repo is the raw code only. The guides explain everything.

entries.en-US: The advanced techniques - token optimization, memory persistence across sessions, verification loops & evals, parallelization strategies, subagent orchestration, and continuous learning. Everything in this guide has working code in this repo.
entries.zh-Hans: 高级技术 - 令牌优化、跨会话内存持久化、验证循环与评估、并行化策略、子智能体编排和持续学习。本指南中的所有内容在此仓库中都有可运行的代码。

entries.en-US:
| Topic | What You'll Learn |
|-------|-------------------|
| Token Optimization | Model selection, system prompt slimming, background processes |
| Memory Persistence | Hooks that save/load context across sessions automatically |
| Continuous Learning | Auto-extract patterns from sessions into reusable skills |
| Verification Loops | Checkpoint vs continuous evals, grader types, pass@k metrics |
| Parallelization | Git worktrees, cascade method, when to scale instances |
| Subagent Orchestration | The context problem, iterative retrieval pattern |
entries.zh-Hans:
| 主题 | 你将学到什么 |
|-------|-------------------|
| 令牌优化 | 模型选择，系统提示精简，后台进程 |
| 内存持久化 | 自动跨会话保存/加载上下文的钩子 |
| 持续学习 | 从会话中自动提取模式为可重用技能 |
| 验证循环 | 检查点与持续评估，评分器类型，pass@k 指标 |
| 并行化 | Git 工作树，级联方法，何时扩展实例 |
| 子智能体编排 | 上下文问题，迭代检索模式 |

entries.en-US: ## Quick Start
entries.zh-Hans: ## 快速开始

entries.en-US: ### 1. Copy what you need
entries.zh-Hans: ### 1. 复制你需要的部分

entries.en-US:
```bash
# Clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/affaan-m/everything-claude-code.git

# Copy agents to your Claude config
cp everything-claude-code/agents/*.md ~/.claude/agents/

# Copy rules
cp everything-claude-code/rules/*.md ~/.claude/rules/

# Copy commands
cp everything-claude-code/commands/*.md ~/.claude/commands/

# Copy skills
cp -r everything-claude-code/skills/* ~/.claude/skills/
```
entries.zh-Hans:
```bash
# Clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/affaan-m/everything-claude-code.git

# Copy agents to your Claude config
cp everything-claude-code/agents/*.md ~/.claude/agents/

# Copy rules
cp everything-claude-code/rules/*.md ~/.claude/rules/

# Copy commands
cp everything-claude-code/commands/*.md ~/.claude/commands/

# Copy skills
cp -r everything-claude-code/skills/* ~/.claude/skills/
```

entries.en-US: ### 2. Add hooks to settings.json
entries.zh-Hans: ### 2. 将钩子添加到 settings.json

entries.en-US: Copy the hooks from `hooks/hooks.json` to your `~/.claude/settings.json`.
entries.zh-Hans: 将 `hooks/hooks.json` 中的钩子复制到你的 `~/.claude/settings.json`。

entries.en-US: ### 3. Configure MCPs
entries.zh-Hans: ### 3. 配置 MCPs

entries.en-US: Copy desired MCP servers from `mcp-configs/mcp-servers.json` to your `~/.claude.json`.
entries.zh-Hans: 将 `mcp-configs/mcp-servers.json` 中所需的 MCP 服务器复制到你的 `~/.claude.json`。

entries.en-US: **Important:** Replace `YOUR_*_HERE` placeholders with your actual API keys.
entries.zh-Hans: **重要：** 将 `YOUR_*_HERE` 占位符替换为你实际的 API 密钥。

entries.en-US: ### 4. Read the guides
entries.zh-Hans: ### 4. 阅读指南

entries.en-US: Seriously, read the guides. These configs make 10x more sense with context.
entries.zh-Hans: 说真的，阅读指南。有了上下文，这些配置会好理解 10 倍。

entries.en-US: ## Background
entries.zh-Hans: ## 背景

entries.en-US: I've been using Claude Code since the experimental rollout. Won the Anthropic x Forum Ventures hackathon in Sep 2025 building [zenith.chat](https://zenith.chat) with [@DRodriguezFX](https://x.com/DRodriguezFX) - entirely using Claude Code.
entries.zh-Hans: 我从实验性推出以来就一直在使用 Claude Code。在 2025 年 9 月，与 [@DRodriguezFX](https://x.com/DRodriguezFX) 一起使用 Claude Code 构建 [zenith.chat](https://zenith.chat)，赢得了 Anthropic x Forum Ventures 黑客马拉松。

entries.en-US: These configs are battle-tested across multiple production applications.
entries.zh-Hans: 这些配置已在多个生产应用程序中经过实战测试。

entries.en-US: ## Important Notes
entries.zh-Hans: ## 重要说明

entries.en-US: ### Context Window Management
entries.zh-Hans: ### 上下文窗口管理

entries.en-US: **Critical:** Don't enable all MCPs at once. Your 200k context window can shrink to 70k with too many tools enabled.
entries.zh-Hans: **关键：** 不要一次性启用所有 MCP。启用过多工具后，你的 200k 上下文窗口可能会缩小到 70k。

entries.en-US: Rule of thumb:
entries.zh-Hans: 经验法则：

entries.en-US:
- Have 20-30 MCPs configured
- Keep under 10 enabled per project
- Under 80 tools active
entries.zh-Hans:
* 配置 20-30 个 MCP
* 每个项目保持启用少于 10 个
* 活动工具少于 80 个

entries.en-US: Use `disabledMcpServers` in project config to disable unused ones.
entries.zh-Hans: 在项目配置中使用 `disabledMcpServers` 来禁用未使用的工具。

entries.en-US: ### Customization
entries.zh-Hans: ### 定制化

entries.en-US: These configs work for my workflow. You should:
entries.zh-Hans: 这些配置适用于我的工作流。你应该：

entries.en-US:
1. Start with what resonates
2. Modify for your stack
3. Remove what you don't use
4. Add your own patterns
entries.zh-Hans:
1. 从引起共鸣的部分开始
2. 根据你的技术栈进行修改
3. 移除你不使用的部分
4. 添加你自己的模式
